faucet_component_address.description: A component address serialized as an `Address` from the `Value` model which represents the address of the faucet component on the requested network.

faucet_package_address.description: A package address serialized as an `Address` from the `Value` model which represents the address of the faucet package on the requested network.

account_package_address.description: A package address serialized as an `Address` from the `Value` model which represents the address of the account package on the requested network.

xrd_resource_address.description: A resource address serialized as an `Address` from the `Value` model which represents the address of the XRD resource on the requested network.

system_token_resource_address.description: A resource address serialized as an `Address` from the `Value` model which represents the address of the system resource on the requested network.

ecdsa_secp256k1_token_resource_address.description: A resource address serialized as an `Address` from the `Value` model which represents the address of the Ecdsa Secp256k1 resource on the requested network.

eddsa_ed25519_token_resource_address.description: A resource address serialized as an `Address` from the `Value` model which represents the address of the EdDSA Ed25519 resource on the requested network.

package_token_resource_address.description: A resource address serialized as an `Address` from the `Value` model which represents the address of the package token resource on the requested network.

consensus_manager_component_address.description: A system address serialized as an `Address` from the `Value` model which represents the address of the consensus manager on the requested network.
